Room.Name: Quaymanire's Repair Shop
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a shop and see a sign, "If it ain't magic, I can fix it."
Room.LongDescription: A huge forge gives off an immense amount of heat as you stand here. Racks of used armor and gleaming swords and daggers line the wall, and a half-giant wearing a leather apron waits behind the counter. he looks a little impatient.
